text: Ohuu ɔbarima bi wɔ ɔdan mu hɔ a na ne nsa baako awu. Farisifo no bisaa Yesu se, “Enti mmara ma ho kwan sɛ obi sa yare Homeda ana?”12.10 Mmara akyerɛkyerɛfo mma ayaresa ho kwan homeda; gye sɛ wohu sɛ, sɛ wɔansa ɔyarefo no yare da no ara na ade kye a, obewu. Obi a na ne nsa awu no de, na ɛnyɛ nea owu hunahuna no. Wobisaa eyi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobenya kwan atoto nʼano na wɔakyere no!
